definition: causing or able to cause motion, machine that converts other forms of energy into mechanical energy and so imparts motion, to travel or be transported in a vehicle
details:
adjective
- causing or able to cause motion
= example: causing or able to cause motion
= synonyms: motive
- conveying information to the muscles from the central nervous system
= example: conveying information to the muscles from the central nervous system
= synonyms: centrifugal
noun
- machine that converts other forms of energy into mechanical energy and so imparts motion
= example: machine that converts other forms of energy into mechanical energy and so imparts motion
- a nonspecific agent that imparts motion
= example: a nonspecific agent that imparts motion
verb
- to travel or be transported in a vehicle
= example: to travel or be transported in a vehicle
= synonyms: drive
